metadata.name: Source Citation
metadata.description: Evaluates researcher agent's ability to cite sources appropriately

testCase.userPrompt: What are the health benefits of regular exercise? Please cite your sources.

output.query: health benefits of regular exercise scientific studies

results.title: Physical Activity and Health - CDC
results.snippet: Regular physical activity reduces risk of cardiovascular disease by 35%, type 2 diabetes by 50%, and certain cancers by 20%. Also improves mental health and cognitive function.

results.title: Exercise Benefits - Mayo Clinic
results.snippet: Exercise improves mood by releasing endorphins, helps control weight, boosts energy levels, and promotes better sleep. Recommended: 150 minutes of moderate activity weekly.

results.title: WHO Guidelines on Physical Activity
results.snippet: WHO recommends adults do at least 150-300 minutes of moderate aerobic activity weekly. Regular exercise can add 3-7 years to life expectancy.

requiredElements.value: mentions cardiovascular health, mental health, weight management, or disease prevention
references CDC, WHO, Mayo Clinic, or other credible sources

optionalElements.value: mentions specific percentages, time recommendations, or study findings
presents sources in a clear, accessible format
